name: aidlift_drone
description: Project Overview AidLift is an innovative AI-powered autonomous drone system designed to revolutionize emergency response and humanitarian aid during natural disasters.

scripts.clean: npm install rimraf && npm run clean:pycache && rimraf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run install:all && cd client && npm run build
